definitions.definition: Having a kind personality; kind, warmhearted, sympathetic.
definitions.example: A kindly old man sits on the park bench every afternoon feeding pigeons.

definitions.definition: Favourable, gentle, pleasant, tidy, auspicious, beneficent.
Natural; inherent to the kind or race.
In a kind manner, out of kindness.
definitions.example: He kindly offered to take us to the station in his car.

definitions.definition: Used to make a polite request: please.
definitions.example: Kindly move your car out of the front yard.

definitions.definition: With kind acceptance; used with take.
definitions.example: Aunt Daisy didn't take it kindly when we forgot her anniversary.
